value.name: Baltimore police leader urges reformers to move carefully
value.description: Baltimore City Police Commissioner Michael Harrison Wednesday cautioned that calls for defunding or dramatically reforming the police department need to be tempered with realistic expectations about how to maintain important services and improve public safety.
